instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 Slow on Battery
threads.message: Any idea what could cause a 3115 board to be slow on battery? PBUS sense is working fine - 2V on R5488. ASD fails whetstone test but nothing else. I've never seen this where it wasn't a PBUS sense issue.

threads.title: 820-3115 Slow on Battery
threads.message: only on battery is slow??? have you tried another known good battery??

threads.title: 820-3115 Slow on Battery
threads.message: Yeah, tried other batteries. Works great with adapter plugged in. Slows down by about 30-40% on battery - beach balls. Plugging it back in fixes the problem immediately. No liquid-damage at all to Q5480 area - PBUS circuit is fine.

threads.title: 820-3115 Slow on Battery
threads.message:
Could be ME issue. Try this BIOS, backup your original! 
[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByfhQ_x0v-tZYy1WaGhQNTVQME0[/url]

threads.message:
